This is a sample python library that can be installed by other projects.

# Making new changes

Remember to run:

```
pipenv shell
```

# Deploying new changes

## Step 1: Update the version number in setup.py

## Step 2: Deploy

```
make install_required
make build_package
make push_to_pypi
```

# Installation

To install, run:

```
pip install dop-python-pip-package
```
